page.title: 12RECREATION IN POYNTON (1)
page.content: For a population of 15,000 Poynton has good facilities for leisure and recreation.On its doorstep is good walking country and canal cruising, it has good fishing waters.There is a sports centre with a swimming pool on the same campus as Poynton High School a Social Centre in the middle of the village run by its members, and the Poynton Sports Club.The Club is celebrating its centenary.It caters for 8 different sports and has forty teams from its various sections.It has plans for considerable development in the future.The British Legion,Working Mens Club,Green Lane Tennis Club and Brass Band Centre provide recreation for many, with Cubs,Brownies,Guides, Scouts,the Commodores and Church Youth Clubs providing activity for the young
